problem_text_cn: 如图,C是以AB为直径的半圆O上一点,连结AC,BC,分别以AC,BC为边向外作正方形ACDE,BCFG．DE,FG,⁀{AC},⁀{BC}的中点分别是M,N,P,Q．若MP+NQ=12,AC+BC=16,则AB的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, C is a point on the semicircle O with AB as the diameter, connect AC and BC, and make square ACDE and BCFG with AC and BC as the sides respectively. The midpoints of DE, FG, ⁀AC, ⁀BC are M, N, P, Q respectively. If MP + NQ = N_0, AC + BC = N_1, then the length of AB is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接OP,OQ,∵DE,FG,⁀{AC},⁀{BC}的中点分别是M,N,P,Q,∴OP⊥AC,OQ⊥BC,∵AC∥DE,∴O、P、M三点共线,∴H、I是AC、BD的中点,∴OH+OI=\frac{1}{2}(AC+BC)=8,∵MH+NI=AC+BC=16,MP+NQ=12,∴PH+QI=16-12=4,∴AB=OP+OQ=OH+OI+PH+QI=8+4=12,故选:C．
